Templates

template newShaderStatic(computePath: string): Shader
Creates a new shader but also statically reads computePath so it is compiled into the binary. Source   Edit   
template newShaderStatic(vertPath, fragPath: string): Shader
Creates a new shader but also statically reads vertPath and fragPath so they are compiled into the binary. Source   Edit
